meanings.definition: To move or run quickly and energetically, like a dogtrotting.
meanings.sent1: The puppy was dogtrotting around the yard.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys dogtrotting in the park every morning.
meanings.sent3: The dogtrotting squirrel surprised everyone with its speed.
meanings.sent4: His heart was dogtrotting with excitement as he approached the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The children were dogtrotting happily towards the ice cream truck.

meanings.definition: The act of moving or running quickly and energetically, like a dogtrotting.
meanings.sent1: The dogtrotting of the horses echoed through the valley.
meanings.sent2: She could hear the dogtrotting of the marathon runners from afar.
meanings.sent3: The synchronized dogtrotting of the dancers brought smiles to the audience.
meanings.sent4: The rhythmic dogtrotting of the drummers set the pace for the parade.
meanings.sent5: The thunderous dogtrotting of the elephants shook the ground beneath them.
